charges.charge_description: 18:2313, 2 and 3551 et seq.-SALE OR RECEIPT OF STOLEN VEHICLES. Defendant possessed motor vehicles which had crossed a State boundary after bein stolen. (5s)
18:513(a), 2 and 3551 et seq.-UTTER FORGED AND COUNTERFEIT SECURITY. Defendant intended to deceive making and possessing a counterfeit security, to wit, a Motor Vehicle Certificate of Title. (7s-8s)
18:2321 Possession with intent to sell or dispose of an automobile knowing the identification number to have been obliterated. [1:96-m-42]
18:371 and 3551 et seq.-CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES. Defendant conspired to sell automobiles which there identification numbers had been removed, tampered iwth and altered. (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant assessed $100.00, sentenced to 5 years of probation. Defendant to pay restitution as follows: $120,000.00 on count 1, $90, 000.00 on count 6 to be paid as follows: 10% of gross salaray. (1s)

charges.charge_description: 18:513(a), 2 and 3551 et seq.-UTTER FORGED AND COUNTERFEIT SECURITY. Defendant intended to deceive making and possessing a counterfeit security, to wit, a Motor Vehicle Certificate of Title. (6s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant assessed $100.00, sentenced to 5 years of probation. Defendant to pay restitution as follows: $120,000.00 on count 1, $90, 000.00 on count 6 to be paid as follows: 10% of gross salaray. (6s)

charges.charge_description: 18:371 &; 3551 et seq-CONSPIRED TO RECEIVE, POSSESS &; OBTAIN CONTROL OF, WITH INTENT TO SELL CERTAIN MOTOR VEHICLES, KNOWING THAT IDENTIFICATION NUMBERS HAD BVEEN REMOVED. (1)
18:2321, 2 and 3551 et seq.-TRAFFICKING IN MOTOR VEHICLES/MOTOR VEHICLE PARTS. Defendant possessed motor vehicles with intent to sell knowing VIN # had been altered. (2s-4s)
18:2321, 2 &; 3551 et seq-RECEIVED &; POSSESSED &; OBTAINED CONTROL OF MOTOR VEHICLES, KNOWING THAT IDENTIFICATION NUMBERS HAD BEEN REOVED. (2-4)
